ygData.subject: RE: Tracking
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe I been with rangers who wish they could track only as good as us!  They dont like seeing crap that is clear across the zone andprefer to see stuff that is
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe I been with rangers who wish they could track only as good as us! They
dont like seeing crap that is clear across the zone andprefer to see stuff
that is fairly close by. Guess Verant had a real "wizard" design ranger
tracking.

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 35th Song
<Spirit of the Moon>
somewhere on Innoruuk

-----Original Message-----
From: Kevikazzam@... [mailto:Kevikazzam@...]
Sent: Thursday, November 11, 1999 11:18 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Tracking


From: Kevikazzam@...



I don't necessarily want to track as good as a ranger, or forage - but I
WOULD like to be able to have the thing be useful.
<snip>

My track capped out at 100 i believe. and i find it very very useful.
especially in Solb when there are 40 - 50 people there. I can find that dog
that just spawned before other people. :)


Ulaien Firesong
lvl 45 bard of tunare
